Visiting post-doc at the CIDE-CSIC in [Francesco de Bello’s lab](https://functionaldiversitylab.com); Researcher at the University of Tartu - [Macroecology workgroup](https://macroecology.ut.ee/en/). <br> My research focuses on understanding how global change drivers (e.g. climate and land-use change) affect the way ecological communities are assembled across space and time.
